welcome_message_body: Welcome to Bima, Indonesia! Known for its beautiful beaches, rich culture, and warm hospitality, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our charming city has to offer.

restaurants.name: surf cafe
restaurants.description: surf cafe is a snack place located in the city.
